verse:
सर्वाजीवे सर्वसंस्थे बृहन्ते अस्मिन्हंसो भ्राम्यते ब्रह्मचक्रे।
पृथगात्मानं प्रेरितारं च मत्वा जुष्टस्ततस्तेनामृतत्वमेति॥

terms.ब्रह्मचक्रे: in the cycle of existence (Wheel of Brahman)

meaning: In this grand universe, the soul wanders in the cycle of existence within all living beings and elements. By recognizing/knowing/worshipping the God as the one who prompts this journey, and engaging in this contemplation, one attains immortality.
